name: Save the B.O.Z. (DEMO)
description:
In the DEMO version:

Story mode Game- Save The B.O.Z. (DEMO)

Use you trackpad or mouse to control the cat

The aim of the game is to reach the happy ending.

There are 5 endings:

4 bad, and 1 happy end.

In the next update there will be mini-games in each ending))

In the REAL version(in proggress):

After each 5 endings there will be mini games.

Here is an example of mini game developed with SCRATCH:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/413399207/
